metadata.title: Vault Secrets Operator with HCP Vault Secrets
metadata.description: The Vault Secrets Operator allows pods to consume HCP Vault Secrets natively from Kubernetes Secrets.

outlineItems.title: Vault Secrets Operator with HCP Vault Secrets

pageHeading.title: Vault Secrets Operator with HCP Vault Secrets

a Kubernetes Secret. Vault syncs each `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`HCPVaultSecretsApp`),` custom resource periodically to ensure that
changes to the secret source are properly reflected in the Kubernetes secret.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"features"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#features","aria-label":"features permalink"},`\xbb`),`Features`),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},`Periodic synchronization of HCP Vault Secrets app to a `,mdx("em",{parentName:"li"},`destination`),` Kubernetes Secret.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},`Automatic drift detection and remediation when the destination Kubernetes Secret
is modified or deleted.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},`Supports all VSO features, including rollout-restarts on secret rotation or
during drift remediation.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},`Supports authentication to HCP using `,mdx("a",{parentName:"li","href":"/hcp/docs/hcp/admin/iam/service-principals"},`HCP service principals`),`.`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},`Supports `,mdx("a",{parentName:"li","href":"#static-secrets"},`static`),`, `,mdx("a",{parentName:"li","href":"#auto-rotating-and-dynamic-secrets"},`auto-rotating and dynamic secrets`),`
within an HCP Vault Secrets app.`)),mdx("h3",{"id":"supported-hcp-authentication-methods"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h3","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#supported-hcp-authentication-methods","aria-label":"supported hcp authentication methods permalink"},`\xbb`),`Supported HCP authentication methods`),mdx("table",null,mdx("thead",{parentName:"table"},mdx("tr",{parentName:"thead"},mdx("th",{parentName:"tr","align":null},`Backend`),mdx("th",{parentName:"tr","align":null},`Description`))),mdx("tbody",{parentName:"table"},mdx("tr",{parentName:"tbody"},mdx("td",{parentName:"tr","align":null},mdx("a",{parentName:"td","href":"/hcp/docs/hcp/admin/iam/service-principals"},`HCP Service Principals`)),mdx("td",{parentName:"tr","align":null},`Relies on static credentials for authenticating to HCP`)))),mdx("h3",{"id":"hcp-vault-secrets-sync-example"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h3","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#hcp-vault-secrets-sync-example","aria-label":"hcp vault secrets sync example permalink"},`\xbb`),`HCP Vault Secrets sync example`),mdx("p",null,`The following Kubernetes configuration can be used to sync the HCP Vault Secrets app, `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`vso-example`),`,

you have already setup `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/vault/docs/platform/k8s/vso/api-reference#hcpauthserviceprincipal"},`service principal Kubernetes secret`),`,
and have created the HCP Vault Secrets app.`),mdx("p",null,`Use the following Kubernetes configuration to sync your HCP Vault Secrets app, `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`vso-example`),`,

metadata.title: Vault by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Vault handles leasing, key revocation, key rolling, auditing, and provides secrets as a service through a unified API.

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vault

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Vault plugins.

sidebarLinks.title: Tutorial: Create a custom secrets engine
